--- title: "분포" date: 2025-06-19 categories: ["확률 통계"] --- ![](/img/stat-thumb.jpg){.post-thumbnail} ## Pmf를 이용한 확률 ### 쿠키 문제 ::: {#63b9c69d .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} from empiricaldist import Pmf import pandas as pd prior = Pmf.from_seq(['Bowl 1', 'Bowl 2']) likelihood_vanilla = [0.75, 0.5] posterior = prior * likelihood_vanilla posterior.normalize() posterior ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=34} ```{=html}
probs
Bowl 1 0.6
Bowl 2 0.4
``` ::: ::: - 만약 같은 그릇에서 한 번 더 쿠키를 꺼냈을 때 바닐라일 경우 ::: {#5b58adf3 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} posterior *= likelihood_vanilla posterior.normalize() posterior ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=35} ```{=html}
probs
Bowl 1 0.692308
Bowl 2 0.307692
``` ::: ::: - 만약 같은 그릇에서 한 번 더 쿠키를 꺼냈을 때 초코쿠키일 경우 ::: {#7146a469 .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} likelihood_chocolate = [0.25, 0.5] posterior *= likelihood_chocolate posterior.normalize() posterior ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=36} ```{=html}
probs
Bowl 1 0.529412
Bowl 2 0.470588
``` ::: ::: ### 101개의 쿠키 그릇 - 그릇 i에는 바닐라 쿠키가 i% 있다. - 임의의 그릇을 골라 쿠키를 임의로 꺼냈을 때, 바닐라 쿠키라면 그릇 x에서 쿠키가 나왔을 확률은 얼마일까? ::: {#82aeb063 .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} import numpy as np hypos = np.arange(101) prior = Pmf(1, hypos) prior.normalize() prior ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=37} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: {#d8ff2e13 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} likelihood_vanilla = hypos / 100 posterior1 = prior * likelihood_vanilla posterior1.normalize() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=38} ``` 0.5000000000000001 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#7e7795cf .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} import matplotlib.pyplot as plt plt.rcParams['font.family'] = 'Noto Sans KR' prior.plot(label='prior', color='C5') posterior1.plot(label='posterior', color='C4') plt.legend() plt.xlabel('그릇 번호') plt.ylabel('PMF') plt.title('바닐라 쿠키 하나 뽑은 후') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=39} ``` Text(0.5, 1.0, '바닐라 쿠키 하나 뽑은 후') ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](02_files/figure-html/cell-7-output-2.png){width=609 height=451} ::: ::: - 한 번 더 뽑았을 때 바닐라 쿠키인 경우 ::: {#9cf40a94 .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} posterior2 = posterior1 * likelihood_vanilla posterior2.normalize() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=40} ``` 0.6699999999999999 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#864f7540 .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} posterior2.plot(label='posterior', color='C4') plt.xlabel('그릇 번호') plt.ylabel('PMF') plt.title('바닐라 쿠키 두 번 뽑은 후') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=41} ``` Text(0.5, 1.0, '바닐라 쿠키 두 번 뽑은 후') ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](02_files/figure-html/cell-9-output-2.png){width=601 height=451} ::: ::: - 한 번 더 뽑았는데 초코 쿠키인 경우 ::: {#6ab9c2f8 .cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} likelihood_chocolate = 1 - hypos / 100 posterior3 = posterior2 * likelihood_chocolate posterior3.normalize() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=42} ``` 0.2462686567164179 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#1a0bdc6e .cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} posterior3.plot(label='posterior', color='C4') plt.xlabel('그릇 번호') plt.ylabel('PMF') plt.title('바닐라 쿠키 두 번 뽑고 초코 쿠키 하나 뽑은 후') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=43} ``` Text(0.5, 1.0, '바닐라 쿠키 두 번 뽑고 초코 쿠키 하나 뽑은 후') ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](02_files/figure-html/cell-11-output-2.png){width=609 height=451} ::: ::: ::: {#aa3fa795 .cell execution_count=11} ``` {.python .cell-code} posterior3.max_prob() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=44} ``` 67 ``` ::: ::: - MAP: 사후확률 분포에서 가장 큰 확률값 ### 주사위 문제 ::: {#f17d0ccf .cell execution_count=12} ``` {.python .cell-code} def update_dice(pmf, data): hypos = pmf.qs likelihood = 1 / hypos likelihood[data > hypos] = 0 pmf *= likelihood pmf.normalize() ``` ::: - 주사위를 굴려서 1이 나왔다. ::: {#9302623e .cell execution_count=13} ``` {.python .cell-code} hypos = [6, 8, 12] pmf = Pmf(1/3, hypos) update_dice(pmf, 1) pmf ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=46} ```{=html}
